item.title: Gambling Chests
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

case ####: if(playerHasItemAmmount(995, 100000)) { gambling(); } else { sendMessage("You don't have enough money to play!"); } break;

public void gambling() { if(misc.random(100) < 50) { deleteItem(995, 100000, getItemSlot(995); addSkillXp(500000, 2); } else { if(misc.random(100) > 49) { deleteItem(995, 100000, getItemSlot(995); sendMessage("You don't get anything"); } } }

I just completely pulled that out hand-coded, so you may have some errors. Just post them if so.

Read full topic

kk i got this code, but when i click the chest nothing happenes

case 375:
if(misc.random(100) < 50)
{
addSkillXP(500000, 2);
}
if(misc.random(100) > 49)
{
sendMessage(“You receive nothing.”);
}
break;

case 378:
if(misc.random(100) > 49)
{
int[] rew = {15333, 15334, 15335, 15336};
int l = (int) (Math.random() * rew.length);
addItem(rew[l], 1);
}
if(misc.random(100) < 49)
{
sendMessage(“You receive nothing.”);
}
break;

I Tried Adding The 100k Thing But It Didnt Work Either, I Also Tried Looking At A Tut For Gambling Chests, for the chest id 2380 And That Didnt Work Either, So Please, Give Me The Coding And Tell Me Where IT Should Go If I Had To Add Anything
